mapper.update: update employee set emp_number = #{emp_number, jdbcType=VARCHAR},emp_name = #{emp_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR},emp_email = #{emp_email, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where emp_number = #{emp_number_0}
update employee set emp_number = #{emp_number_1, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where emp_number = #{emp_number_0}
update dept set dname = #{dname, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where deptno = #{deptno, jdbcType=INTEGER}
